item.description:
Join us for some doggie socializing, people socializing, coffee and treats (both dog and human!). Look forward to meeting you and your furry friend!

Our indoor facility is fully matted for cleanliness and comfort. We have a fenced in, matted outdoor area for play and bathroom needs.

Important: Please keep in mind that the health of our small dog friends is one of our top priorities. When dogs play together, it is very important that each dog is current on all of their vaccinations. These vaccinations include: DHLPP, Bordatella (canine cough) and Rabies. Please ensure that your small dog friend is current on all vaccinations before coming to the meet ups!

Directions:
Directions to Off The Leash can be found on our website. Just type in your starting address after you click on the following link:

http://www.offtheleas...

group.name: The North Attleboro Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: February Meet Up
